metadata.name: Mixing the footprints
metadata.description:
The referee is leaving the pitch after the game crossing the green lines and footprints of the soccer players during the Fifa World Cup 2018.

Photographer: Asatur Yesayants

Edition: 1/1

License: Extended Editorial
